story-moment.ESCAPING KYLN: In the prison called the Kyln, Groot and his partner Rocket worked with Star-Lord, Gamora, and Drax for the first time in order to escape together.
story-moment.HEROIC SACRIFICE: Groot heroically sacrificed himself to save his fellow Guardians during the battle with Ronan and his forces.
story-moment.BABY GROOT IS BORN: Regrowing his body from a single twig, Groot happily listened to music while the Guardians battled an Abilisk.
story-moment.GROOT SAVES THE GUARDIANS: The baby incarnation of Groot, treated terribly by the Ravagers as their “mascot,” struck back after helping Yondu and Rocket break out of imprisonment.
story-moment.LENDING A BRANCH: Now a disaffected adolescent, Groot was compelled to help save the life of Thor, using his own arm to create the handle for the mighty axe known as Stormbreaker.

powers+abilities.STRENGTH: Notably strong, Groot is capable of taking on multiple foes at the same time.
powers+abilities.GROWING GROOT VINES: Groot can grow portions of his body as needed, creating vine-like extensions or extending his height or reach.
powers+abilities.WICKED TOUGH WOOD: Groot’s wood form can withstand attacks from weapons ranging from firearms to swords.
powers+abilities.LIGHT SPORES: Groot can create light via spores generated from his body.
powers+abilities.REGENERATION: While not retaining the memories of his former self, Groot’s entire form can regenerate after his death using a small portion of his original body as its basis.
